title: Score Amnesia Plague
outcome: A system glitch wipes thousands of BCI profiles. Bereft of record or score, affected citizens form tight communities where trust, not data, determines participation. Black markets for identity flourish. The Council’s attempt at psychological control only fosters solidarity, further undermining BCI’s social grip.

events.description: Without warning, thousands of citizens discover their BCI files are wiped clean—erasing employment, access, and behavioral records.
'Amnesiac' communities form, using word-of-mouth and direct barter to survive. High-score residents secretly assist, fearing the system’s instability.
A thriving black market for counterfeit BCI records, forged testimonials, and shared memories emerges. The Council's attempts to contain it only expand underground networks.
Psychological counselors dispatched by the Council are rejected and mocked. Mass public forums hold open discussions on living without data oversight.
Most citizens in wiped zones prefer their new informal social structures, openly ignoring BCI dictates and setting a precedent for organized noncompliance citywide.
